title: Golden Key
description: A small golden key that can be used to unlock lockboxes.

title: Jade Eye
description: A mysterious eye-shape jade. One of the three requirements to open Jade Fox's treasure.

title: The Legend Sword
description: This is the best weapon. One of the three requirements to open Jade Fox's treasure.

title: Red Gem Ring
description: Fox King's ring which represents throne. One of the three requirements to open Jade Fox's treasure.
